Escape from the Aliens in Outer Space
This app is to be used in conjunction with the Escape from the Aliens in Outer Space board game.

• Select the number of players using the dropdown
 • Change the names of players by selecting a text box and changing the name.
 • Touch the colored box to change player color

• Turn navigation is in the upper right corner
 • The number on top represents the current turn in the game.
 • The number on the bottom represents the current turn that you are editing.
 • Touch the right arrow to increment the turn that you are editing. If you are editing the current game turn, touching the right arrow will start a new turn.
 • Touch the left arrow to edit a previous turn.
 • Touch the current turn number to return to editing the current turn.
 • The player with the yellow outline is the one whose turn you are editing.
 • Touch a different player box to change the currently selected player.
 • Touch a sector to add a move indicator to it for the current player and turn.
 • Touching the hexagon again will turn the move indicator into a circle. You can use circles to indicate guesses.
 • Touch the sector a third time to remove the move from that turn and player.
 • Touch and hold any player's colored square to add an indicator for human vs. alien. This will add a red halo around the player box for humans, and a green halo for aliens.
 • Pinch to zoom and drag to scroll.
